title.narrative: All children have rights - Danish Refugee Council (DRC) - Christmas calendar project 2013

description.narrative: The project aims to strengthen the capacity of local communities in Myanmar to act in situations of conflict and/or natural disasters. Efforts are particularly focused on protecting children's rights. Individual strategies are developed to get children back to school and structural causes of lack of schooling identified and addressed to the relevant authorities. The project includes an information section, the main aim is to give school students in Denmark understanding of how important it is to have rights and provide insight into children's lives in a society where climate change and natural disasters are fixed elements. The project seeks to achieve the following results: 3,500 children are able to use increased knowledge of hygiene, health and risk mitigation strategies, 2,500 children increase their school attendance, 1,000 children will benefit from increased protection, improved health and leisure activity as a result of local partners' initiatives and mitigation measures in relation to natural disasters and displacement have been implemented in 15 communities.
